mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name, price, quantity, details, use_yn, file_group_id, create_date_time, sales_time, end_time) VALUES (#{product.productName}, #{product.price}, #{product.quantity}, #{product.details}, #{product.useYn}, #{product.fileGroupId}, #{product.createDateTime}, #{product.salesTime}, #{product.endTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity, details, use_yn, file_group_id, create_date_time, sales_time, end_time FROM product WHERE product_id = #{productId}
